programme.title: Judge Steve Harvey
programme.desc: Steve Harvey serves as the judge, jury and star, and must rule on various cases in his courtroom based on some good old common sense. In the first case, childhood best friends argue over one not honoring to fulfill their end of a lost bet made over the Super Bowl. In the second case, a woman demands her friend pay up for money she claims she loaned her to purchase a car and find a new place to live, and instead was used to go party in Las Vegas.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: When Beverly steps in for PE coach at William Penn Academy, Adam reluctantly takes her Jazzercise class. He is surprised to find enjoyment in it, until Beverly suffers an embarrassing incident – causing Adam the ultimate humiliation. Brea steps in to show Adam his mother's good intentions and he ultimately comes to her defense. Meanwhile, Barry and Geoff find themselves both up for the same medical internship – causing conflict in their budding friendship.(n)

programme.title: The Wonder Years
programme.desc: Bruce returns home from Vietnam, and the family is shocked to find out he is dating an older woman with an 8-year-old son with whom he is eager to start his life. When they learn more about Bruce's latest deployment, they begin to understand his survivors' guilt and come together to support him.(n)

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Dan enlists the help of a few good friends for the funeral home remodel after Louise points out that Dan's generosity with his time seems to benefit everyone but her; and Robin and Darlene take a big career risk that may not pay off the way they expect it.(n)

programme.title: Home Economics
programme.desc: As Tom struggles to finish his book before his 40th birthday, his dad, Marshall, hijacks his writing seminar. Meanwhile, Denise convinces Marina that she needs to do something special for Tom's 40th and talks her into doing boudoir photos. In addition, Sarah and Denise go overboard to impress a potential sperm donor.(n)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers stop in Torrance and face steep competition. Also: Brandi is scared of Jarrod's find; Ivy tries a new tactic; and Rene welcomes a pair of new buyers.(n)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers visit many auctions in Beaumont, Ca. where Rene finds a huge locker while Mary takes a chance hoping for a longshot score. Also: Jarrod and Brandi let Alex and Bozek run the auctions, but Jarrod has trouble giving up control.(n)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The team visit Westminster, Ca. where high prices require big risks for Jarrod and Brandi. Also: Ivy goes on a buying spree and Rene goes crazy over a collector's unit.(n)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Jarrod and Brandi get back to basics at a West Covina, Ca. auction. Also: Mary starts the day in the hole; Ivy tries to lighten the mood; and Rene heats things.(n)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers visit Palm Springs, Ca. where Mary tries to stay within budget while Darrell is willing to outspend anyone to get a big score. Also: Ivy has trouble focusing and Dan and Laura race to an auction with a higher purpose.(n)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: A Los Angeles auction has a bigger turnout than anticipated. Also: Dave Hester returns; Ivy gets dragged into a strange auction while Rene brings his father along; and someone catches Mary's eye.(n)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers visit Moreno Valley where Mary tries to follow the others to a solid locker; Dave wants to make the others pay a steep price for theirs if he can't make a score of his own; and Ivy and Rene get huge lockers stuffed with goods.(n)

programme.desc: The buyers visit Riverside, Cal. where Jarrod and Brandi try to teach Bozek a lesson; Ivy shoots for a high pay-off with a low buy-in; and Darrell and Brandon find a locker may leave them all wet.(n)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers visit Santa Ana, Cal. where Jarrod and Brandi's plans go awry as Dave shows up to cause trouble. Also: Mary tries to break a losing streak and Rene gets a little help to land a big score.(n)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers visit Ivy's hometown in Lancaster, Cal. where Ivy wants to score big. Also: Rene makes a long drive to prove a point and Mary lands a great locker.(n)

programme.title: Storage Wars

programme.title: The Young and the Restless
programme.desc: Victor accuses Adam of going rogue, and Victoria puts her revenge plan in motion.(n)

programme.title: Eight Men Out
programme.desc: Disgruntled players for a professional baseball team agree to take cash from a gambler in exchange for throwing the 1919 World Series. After they go through with the plan, they are put on trial for their actions.(n)

programme.title: Life of Pi
programme.desc: In this visually stunning adventure drama, a zookeeper's son is stranded at sea aboard a lifeboat with a zebra, an orangutan, a hyena and a Bengal tiger named Richard Parker.(n)

programme.title: Stoker
programme.desc: In this tense psychological drama, a young girl grows obsessed with her mysterious uncle when he moves in with her family following her father's death. Convinced that his quick smile masks malevolent intent, the lonely girl tries to uncover his secrets.(n)

programme.title: The Out Of Towners (?)
programme.desc: Misadventures of an Ohio couple in New York, coping with lost luggage, canceled reservations, con artists and thieves.(n)

programme.title: Just Married
programme.desc: A rich young woman marries a poor radio announcer and finds their relationship tested on a disaster-filled European honeymoon. The couple's chemistry and the characters' outrageous antics make the film.(n)

programme.title: Meet the Spartans
programme.desc: The folks behind the popular \"Scary Movie,\" \"Epic Movie\" and \"Date Movie\" are back, taking even more comic potshots at hit movies like \"300\" and at overexposed celebrities. The loose plot features Sean Maguire and Kevin Sorbo as two Spartan leaders who face off against the vast Persian army. Carmen Electra, Ken Davitian.(n)

programme.title: Chasing Papi
programme.desc: A brisk pace and a strong cast fuel this spirited romantic farce. An executive (Eduardo Verastegui) from L.A. romances three women at the same time---a vibrant Miami waitress, a Manhattan debutante and a brainy Chicago lawyer. But the womanizer's happy world shatters when all three women visit him and discover his infidelity. Roselyn Sanchez, Sofia Vergara, Jaci Velasquez.(n)

programme.title: Cinderella Man
programme.desc: A triumphant and passionate sports bio of Depression-era heavyweight boxing champ Jim Braddock and his devoted wife.(n)

programme.title: Max Payne
programme.desc: Mark Wahlberg gives a dynamic performance in the title role, a grieving cop out to avenge the murder of his family. As his investigation evolves he hooks up with an assassin (Mila Kunis), and events take a scary, supernatural turn for the worse. Rapper Ludacris costars with Beau Bridges. Directed by John Moore, the film is based on a popular video game.(n)

programme.title: The Clearing
programme.desc: Robert Redford and Helen Mirren shine in this suspenseful thriller about a wealthy couple torn apart when the husband is kidnapped by a disgruntled former employee (Willem Dafoe). The millionaire's abduction sets off a nationwide FBI manhunt. Alessandro Nivola, Matt Craven, Melissa Sagemiller, Wendy Crewson.(n)

programme.title: Repentance (?)
programme.desc: In this gripping psychological drama, a troubled man named Angel Sanchez tortures smug self-help author Thomas Carter, who agreed to give him a private consultation. Carter assumed that his client was just another misguided soul, but Sanchez can no longer tell right from wrong.(n)

programme.title: Bug
programme.desc: Jumpy thriller about an unhinged Gulf War vet (Michael Shannon) who infects an Oklahoma waitress (Ashley Judd) with his paranoid delusions involving invasive insects and clandestine military experiments. Directed by William Friedkin and written by Tracy Letts, who adapted his stage play.(n)

programme.title: The Prophecy 3: The Ascent
programme.desc: Christopher Walken resumes his role as Gabriel, the fallen archangel, in this thrilling third installment of the chilling supernatural horror series about warring angels. This time, Gabriel is protector to a child born of an angel and a human. The child is the only one who can stop Pyriel, the evil angel of genocide, from destroying the world. Scott Cleverdon, Vincent Spano, Brad Dourif.(n)

programme.title: The Birdcage (?)
programme.desc: A gay couple, Armand and Albert, are challenged to play it straight when Armand's son brings home his fiancée---the daughter of an ultraconservative senator. Robin Williams, Nathan Lane, Gene Hackman, Dianne Wiest, Dan Futterman, Calista Flockhart, Hank Azaria, Christine Baranski, Tom McGowan, Grant Heslov, James Lally, Luca Tommassini, Tim Kelleher, J. Roy Helland.(n)

programme.title: 2 Minutes of Fame
programme.desc: After he becomes a viral online sensation, an up-and-coming stand-up comedian makes the big move to Los Angeles in the hopes of kickstarting a movie career. Meanwhile, his wife is in a long suffering live-in love, watching him follow his dream while she's stuck home, paying the bills and caring for their child.(n)

programme.title: Twisted
programme.desc: Ashley Judd is riveting in this atmospheric thriller as a San Francisco cop who has just been promoted to homicide detective. But her life begins to unravel when a couple of her recent lovers are found murdered and she becomes the prime suspect.(n)

programme.title: I Am Number Four
programme.desc: This rousing action thriller follows an extraterrestrial (Alex Pettyfer) masquerading as a typical teenager, who begins to understand the extraordinary nature of his powers after falling for a beautiful woman (Dianna Agron). He is forced to put his skills to the test in order to survive the intergalactic forces bent on finding and destroying him.(n)

programme.title: The Untouchables
programme.desc: A Prohibition crime thriller about the battle between gangster Al Capone and federal agent Eliot Ness. Ness and his team of do-gooders set out on a mission to put crime lord Capone out of business.(n)

programme.title: Half Brothers
programme.desc: Renato Murguía is a successful Mexican aviation executive. One day, his world is rocked when he discovers that he has a half-brother from America: Asher Murguía. The free-spirited Asher could not be more different from his career-oriented brother. When they are forced by their ailing father to go on a road trip to attempt to trace the path he took as a Mexican immigrant to the United States, hilarity ensues.(n)

programme.title: Coneheads
programme.desc: Dan Aykroyd and Jane Curtin reprise their \"Saturday Night Live\" roles as an alien couple who settle in New Jersey. The story concerns Beldar and Prymaat, who leave the planet Remulak to prepare for an invasion of Earth. But due to a malfunction, they find themselves plunged into the Hudson River and forced to take up residence in Paramus, N.J.(n)

programme.title: Kajillionaire
programme.desc: Old Dolio, the 26-year-old homeschooled daughter to a dysfunctional pair of Los Angeles scam artists, begins to question her unconventional upbringing and her identity after her parents invite a credulous stranger to participate in an upcoming scheme.(n)

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm
programme.desc: In Terry Gilliam's inventive fantasy, the famed authors are cast as con artists who get caught up in a real-life fairy tale involving a haunted forest where girls have been disappearing. Matt Damon and Heath Ledger star in this whimsical adventure. Jonathan Pryce, Monica Bellucci, Peter Stormare, Lena Headey.(n)

programme.title: War
programme.desc: Action stars Jason Statham and Jet Li pack quite a punch in this full-throttle martial-arts epic. Statham is an FBI agent who goes gunning for the long-thought-dead hitman (Li) who took down his partner three years before. But now, the hired killer is in the middle of an Asian gang war involving the Chinese triad and Japanese yakuza, and all is not as it seems. Directed by Philip G. Atwell. John Lone, Devon Aoki, Saul Rubinek, Ryo Ishibashi.(n)

programme.title: Reservoir Dogs
programme.desc: A band of criminals are assembled for a jewel heist by a kingpin who keeps them anonymous from each other. But when the job goes wrong, the group is left bloodied and panicked, wondering who among them is the rat.(n)

programme.title: Darkness Falls
programme.desc: A vengeful ghost posing as the Tooth Fairy terrorizes children in this chilling horror movie.(n)

programme.title: Rat Race
programme.desc: A motley crew of high rollers races for a $2 million jackpot in this zany ensemble comedy from director Jerry Zucker (\"Airplane!\"). The fun begins when a Las Vegas casino bigwig (John Cleese) selects six people to hunt for a prize in New Mexico. Among the participants: an Italian narcoleptic (Rowan Atkinson), a gambler (Jon Lovitz) and a bighearted mom (Whoopi Goldberg). Seth Green.(n)

programme.title: Deep Impact
programme.desc: Thrilling special effects highlight Mimi Leder's tale of a massive comet headed for Earth. An ambitious journalist (Tea Leoni), investigating what she believes is a Washington sex scandal, discovers that a comet is going to hit Earth. While a team of scientists struggles to alter its course, families prepare for the end. Robert Duvall, Vanessa Redgrave, Morgan Freeman, Leelee Sobieski.(n)

programme.title: The X-Files
programme.desc: FBI agents Fox Mulder (David Duchovny) and Dana Scully (Gillian Anderson) tackle their greatest assignment yet in the big-screen debut of the popular TV characters as they attempt to link some of the show's most notorious conspiracies. Martin Landau, Armin Mueller-Stahl, Blythe Danner, William B. Davis, John Neville, Mitch Pileggi, Jeffrey DeMunn, Terry O'Quinn, Glenne Headly.(n)

programme.title: Runner Runner
programme.desc: A Princeton grad student confronts a malevolent online gambling magnate in Costa Rica, and gets caught in a vicious struggle between the dangerous cyber swindler and the FBI in this high-stakes white-knuckle thriller.(n)

programme.title: Doubt
programme.desc: Writer-director John Patrick Shanley adapts his Pulitzer Prize-winning play into an incendiary battle of wills involving a demagogic nun (Meryl Streep) who's convinced that the parish priest (Philip Seymour Hoffman) is engaged in sexual misconduct with a 12-year-old male student (Joseph Foster II) in their Bronx grade school. A top-notch ensemble cast is excellently aided by Amy Adams as a young nun and Viola Davis as the young boy's mother.(n)

programme.title: Blood Father
programme.desc: This gritty action thriller follows an ex-con tattoo artist as he fights to protect his estranged teenage daughter, who is being hunted by a Mexican drug cartel after getting mixed up in her boyfriend's criminal schemes.(n)

programme.title: The Amityville Horror
programme.desc: A family move into a Long Island house that seems to be haunted by its previous owners.(n)

programme.title: Larry Crowne
programme.desc: In this charming romantic comedy, an unemployed Navy veteran signs up for classes at a community college, and falls for his apathetic public-speaking teacher. In time, she begins to feel as if her problems fade away whenever she's with him.(n)

programme.title: New in Town
programme.desc: Renée Zellweger is a delight as a rising Miami business exec who relocates to rural Minnesota, where she has a bit of trouble adapting to the locals, the area and the weather. It's a refreshing fish-out-of-water (or out of ice water) romantic comedy that costars Harry Connick Jr. as a hunky backwoodsman who melts her heart while she's \"stranded in this frozen wasteland.\" Frances Conroy, Siobhan Fallon Hogan, J.K. Simmons, Mike O'Brien, James Durham, Robert Small. Directed by Jonas Elmer.(n)

programme.title: The Prince
programme.desc: A reformed mob enforcer journeys across the country in search of his missing, college-aged daughter, and comes up against a ruthless corporate criminal with ties to his shady past in this masterful crime drama.(n)

programme.title: The Crying Game
programme.desc: Fergus, an IRA volunteer, assists in the kidnapping of Jody, a British soldier they hope to trade for some imprisoned IRA operatives. Fergus bonds with his hostage, and he later pursues Jody's girlfriend and begins an affair. But all is not as it seems.(n)

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: Stunning special effects highlight this old-fashioned disaster flick. When a scientist (Aaron Eckhart) discovers a catastrophic problem with Earth's core, he and a team of experts embark on a dangerous mission to the middle of the planet in the hopes of averting a global disaster. Hilary Swank, Stanley Tucci, Delroy Lindo, Tcheky Karyo, Richard Jenkins, Alfre Woodard.(n)

programme.title: The Bad News Bears
programme.desc: An ex-minor leaguer takes on an undisciplined, inept sandlot team, and has to bring in a couple of ringers to get them out of a slump.(n)

programme.title: Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World
programme.desc: A British ship captain and his crew battle a French vessel during the Napoleonic Wars. Eventually, the pursuit leads the two ships on an adrenaline-charged chase through the distant reaches of the sea.(n)

programme.title: The Order
programme.desc: Heath Ledger stars as a renegade Catholic priest who uncovers a dark secret in the Church while investigating the death of his mentor in this spine-tingling religious thriller. The script was written by director Brian Helgeland, who penned the Oscar-winning \"L.A. Confidential.\" He also worked with Ledger and costars Shannyn Sossamon and Mark Addy in \"A Knight's Tale.\" Benno Furmann, Peter Weller, Francesco Carnelutti.(n)

programme.title: Fatale (?)
programme.desc: A married man finds himself living a nightmare as he is relentlessly manipulated and out-witted by a mysterious woman with whom he had a wild one night stand.(n)

programme.title: Blue Ruin
programme.desc: In this gripping thriller, Dwight drops out of society after suffering a brutal crime. When the killer who ruined his life is released from jail, he plots revenge, but his mission of vengeance is complicated by the fact that his target has a family.(n)
